content: यामः [यम्-घञ्] {@--1@} Restraint, forbearance, control. {@--2@} A watch, oneeighth part of a day, a period of three hours; अविदितगतयामा रात्रिरेव व्यरंसीत् <ls>U. 1. 27</ls>; पांश्चमाद्यामिनीयामात्प्रसादमिव चेतना <ls>R. 17. 1</ls>; so यामवती, त्रियामा &c. {@--3@} Going, proceeding. {@--4@} Motion, course. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A road. {@--6@} Progress. {@--7@} A car, carriage.
